scripts.db: tsc src/database/init-database.ts & node src/database/init-database.js & npm run db:clear
scripts.db:migrate: tsc src/database/migration-handles.ts & node src/database/migration-handles.js & npm run db:clear
scripts.db:clear: find src/database -type f -name '*.js' ! -path '*/dist/*' ! -path '*/node_modules/*' -exec rm -f {} + && rm -f knexfile.js
